channel.title: Tag: indieweb - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels and self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Half-formed thoughts about Twitter, social silos, web APIs, and mashups
item.description: TL;DR: Turns out, the way to derive value from web APIs is to let your community run off and do free research and development. Harvest the results, and profit. We were never promised participation, but it felt like it was a 2-way street. Silly us. Where do we go from here?
